cars.description: The car made (more) famous by Ferris Bueller's Day Off.  One of only 300 in existence.
One of 406 made and the only one of less than 10 that survived the war, this car was delivered to a British Duke only 18 months before the start of WWII.
This is the 2nd most expensive 'movie car' ever sold but this car also helped win Shelby the FIA in 1965, something no American company had ever done.
This is the fastest production car in the world, reaching over 260 mph on the VW track!.
